content: Write a tweet of 140 characters or less discussing the effectiveness of multifactor authentication in preventing cyberattacks on online banking platforms for small and medium-sized businesses. Provide examples of successful implementations in the financial sector and highlight the importance of regular security audits to maintain data confidentiality and prevent breaches.

🔒 Multifactor Authentication (MFA) is crucial for preventing cyberattacks on SMB online banking platforms. Success stories, like @BankofAmerica & @Chase, show its power! Regular security audits are vital to maintain data confidentiality & thwart breaches. #CyberSecurity #MFA #FinTech 🔐
